title: Sustainability Workshop
description: A workshop focused on sustainable living practices and clothing upcycling.

title: Holiday Clothing Swap
description: Celebrate the holidays by swapping clothes with friends and neighbors!

title: Thrift Shopping Tour
description: Join us for a tour of the best thrift stores in Baton Rouge.
location: Meet at LSU Parking Lot B

title: Fashion Repair Cafe
description: Bring your damaged clothes and learn how to repair them at this hands-on event.

title: Winter Coat Drive
description: Donate your gently used winter coats to help those in need.

title: Eco-Fashion Show
description: A showcase of student-designed clothing made from recycled materials.

title: Community Yard Sale
description: Buy and sell pre-loved clothes and accessories in this community-wide event.

title: Vintage Clothing Auction
description: Bid on unique vintage clothing pieces from local collections.

title: Outdoor Gear Swap
description: Trade or sell your outdoor clothing and gear with fellow adventurers.

title: DIY Tie-Dye Workshop
description: Learn the art of tie-dye and create your custom designs.
